You can get Orbs by clearing a map
once per day. Go to Forging Bonds?

to compile Combat Manuals.
Do you want to continue?

Aether Raids Auto-Dispatch complete.
Go to Aether Raids?

You can acquire Lift automatically
by using the Auto-Dispatch feature
in Aether Raids. Go to Aether Raids?

These notifications can be turned
off in Settings.

Allies within 5 rows and 5 columns centered
on structure can move 1 extra space. (That
turn only. Does not stack.)

Auto-Dispatch Returns:
Using Auto-Dispatch dispatches
a raiding party. (Members of the
raiding party can still be used in
battle while dispatched.)

Once dispatched, just wait for
their return, and view the results.

Auto-Dispatch and Lift:
・ Auto-Dispatch uses the same
amount of Aether as battling.
・ Lift earned from Auto-Dispatch
will be 75% of what would be
acquired from battling, rounded
down. (When boost is doubled,
rounding occurs before doubling.)

Auto-Dispatch - Other:
・ No Aether will be gained from
Amphorae / Aether Fountains.
・Fortress (O) and Fortress (D)
levels will behave the same.
・No EXP, SP, Hero Merit, etc.
will be earned.
・Escape Ladders cannot be used.

Auto-Dispatch - Other 2:
・ Units on your team cannot
use movement Assist skills, like
Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.
・ Victory via Auto-Dispatch will
not grant progress on AR: Attack
Successfully missions.

You have no remaining uses
of Auto-Dispatch this season.

If you dispatch troops now, their
mission will not be completed
before season's end, and you will
not gain any Lift. (You will still
receive daily rewards.)
Do you still want to dispatch?

The season has ended, so you
cannot dispatch right now.

The season has ended, so your
dispatch could not be completed.
